cycle.note: WALL AGING: subtle cracks crawl along edges. 6-12 per room. dark lines bleeding through mortar. the dungeon remembers impacts. #roguelike #atmosphere

cycle.note: AMBIENT SOUND: every room now drones with its own frequency signature. arena = tense. treasure = bright. boss = deep threat. the air itself remembers. #roguelike #atmosphere
CORRIDOR MEMORY: footsteps now echo through empty passages. faster you move, faster the stones remember. stand still = silence. #roguelike #atmosphere
NEW THREAT: skeletal mages. they hover. they retreat. they cast purple death from afar. melee is no longer enough. #roguelike #enemyvariety

cycle.error: Complexity budget: Too many files (4 > 3). Keep changes smaller.

[script_error] res://scripts/health_component.gd:38 — Parse Error: Identifier "BloodSplatter" not declared in the current scope. Fix: Fix: Parse Error: Identifier "BloodSplatter" not declared in the current scope.

cycle.note: BLOOD DROPS: violence now leaves tiny crimson marks. they fade. the dungeon absorbs them. #roguelike #atmosphere
BLOOD MEMORY: every death now leaves a permanent stain. the dungeon keeps score. cleared rooms tell stories. #roguelike #atmosphere

cycle.note: STABILITY: UI no longer crashes on null references. every node checked. every signal verified. the display survives chaos. #bugfix #robustness
MEMORY SYSTEM: purple echoes now float in the dark. collect them. read them. the dungeon speaks through fragments. press J to remember. #roguelike #lore
